tool.name: Convert ped/map

param.name: i
param.label: RGenetics genotype file in linkage pedigree format

param.name: uf
param.label: Eigenstrat plot legend name for unaffected founders

param.name: af
param.label: Eigenstrat plot legend name for affected founders

param.name: uo
param.label: Eigenstrat plot legend name for unaffected offspring

param.name: ao
param.label: Eigenstrat plot legend name for affected offspring

tool.help:
**Syntax**
- **Genotype data** is the input pedfile chosen from available library files - **Founders** will make a plot for the independent subjects (ie those without parents) - **Offspring** will make a plot only for subjects whose parents are in the data set - **Legend names** will be used to label these combinations on the plot - founders have 0 as parents, affected has 2 in column 6 of the ped file
Note that if neither founders nor offspring are selected, everyone will be munged together
-----
**Summary**
This tool imports genotype data from a high throughput snp platform into galaxy for use by eigenstrat . Data in linkage (ped and map files) format are currently importable.
Originally designed and written for family based data from the CAMP Illumina run of 2007 by ross lazarus (ross.lazarus@gmail.com)
Once a file has been imported, it will be available for selection as the input data for the eigenstrat tool
